document.full_text: the united states is preparing for its first test of a sea-based defense against longer-range missiles of a type that officials say could soon threaten europe from iran.
document.title: u.s. gears for high-stakes missile defense test
lines_and_colors: the united states is preparing for its first test of a sea-based defense against longer-range missiles of a type that officials say could soon threaten europe from iran.
